definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Can you name three celebrity endorsers who endorse the sports brand?
sentences.chinese: 請閣下舉出三個運動品牌的代言人？

sentences.english: Do you want to pre-register the Following Fair?
sentences.chinese: 請問閣下是否有興趣優先登記以下展覽會？

sentences.english: Actually, we were hoping to retain your services.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望能借重閣下長才。

sentences.english: If you do not want to receive our promotion material, please click here.
sentences.chinese: 假如閣下不希望再收到星島日報優惠電郵，請按此處。

sentences.english: You must read the conditions and instructions attached to this form.
sentences.chinese: 閣下必須細閱本申請表格所附載條件及指示。

sentences.english: I am enclosing my resume together with my photo, and I believe that they may be found satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 茲隨函附履歷表及照片一份，希望閣下能夠滿意。

sentences.english: "Mr. Silver, sir?" I asked, holding out the note.
sentences.chinese: “閣下是西爾弗先生嗎？”我問，手裏攥着紙條。

sentences.english: Your excellency, special agent Fleury of the Federal Bureau of Investigation and his colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 閣下，這是美國聯邦調查局特派員弗勒裏和他的同僚。

sentences.english: China highly appreciates the positive contribution made by H.E. Pfirter.
sentences.chinese: 中方對菲爾特閣下做出的積極貢獻表示高度讚賞。

sentences.english: You are advised to keep a copy of this completed form for reference.
sentences.chinese: 閣下應保留一份填妥的投訴表格副本，以備參考。

sentences.english: VILI Café is your smartest choice for private gathering and business meeting.
sentences.chinese: 是閣下私人及商業聚會的絕佳選擇。

sentences.english: They contain knowledge that can save us, Lord Rashin, " said Dagen."
sentences.chinese: 它們含有能拯救我們的知識，拉申閣下。

sentences.english: Oviposit date of the female is in commonly next time menstruation comes before tide 14 days or so.
sentences.chinese: 女性的排卵日期1般鄙人次月經來潮前的14天閣下。

sentences.english: He invited Voronin to visit China at his convenience.
sentences.chinese: 他正式邀請沃羅寧總統閣下在雙方方便的時候訪華。

sentences.english: To be valid, you must complete all parts of this Application Form. Please write clearly.
sentences.chinese: 閣下必須清楚填妥本申請表格各部分，方爲有效。

sentences.english: You see me, Lord Bassanio, where I stand.
sentences.chinese: 巴薩尼奧閣下，你瞧我站在這。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
